name: Women's Hyperfreak 4/3+ Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
The O'Neill Women's Hyperfreak 4/3+ Chest Zip Wetsuit is a women's specific performance suit and is constructed from super light TechnoButter 3 and TBX neoprene to give you maximum stretch. O'Neill added 0.5 mm extra of neoprene to this model as a step-up from your normal 4/3. The seams are glued and blindstitched and fully taped with TB3X tape to create an excellent barrier while maintaining your range of motion and flexibility. The Front Upper Zip Entry system uses a free-floating zipper panel and an anti-rash barrier with drain holes to keep you dry and feeling loose. The women's Hyperfreak has nice clean lines and a flattering fit: a Cleanline Surf favorite amongst us ladies.

DETAILS
Thickness: 4/3+mm
Neoprene: TechnoButter 3/3x
Internal Lining: TechnoButter 3x Interior Jersey
Seams: Sealed/Taped
Zipper: Chest Zip
Hood: None
Model Year: 2019/2020
Manufacturers Part Number: 5349
PRODUCT FEATURES
F.U.Z.E (Front Upper Zipper Entry) uses a free floating zipper panel and anti flush barrier with drain holes to keep you dry and feeling loose
360-degree barrier with drain holes
TB3X fully taped seams
Glued and blindstitched seams
Full body and legs made with TechnoButter 3 neoprene
Arms and shoulders made with TechnoButter 3X neoprene
Plus (+) = 0.5mm extra thickness for even more warmth
Minimal seam design for insane flexibilty, fit and durability
Aqua Alpha: eco friendly solvent glue that is water based and free of VOC's
Limestone-based neoprene sourced from Japan

name: Women's Syncro 4/3 Back Zip Wetsuit
description:
Practical and affordable, the Roxy Women’s Syncro 4/3 Back Zip wetsuit is a popular seller for cool water surfers. Eco-friendly and flexible, the StretchFlight 2 neoprene is produced from scrap rubber tires. Stay warm while in the lineup covered in the comfortable WarmFlight thermal fleece. Thermal smoothie skin panels on the chest and back help block wind chill while absorbing solar rays for a cozy feel. Climb into the back entry with ease while zipping up in the YKK 10 plastic zip closure. StretchFlight 3 taped internal seams help make the suit comfortable and watertight.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 4/3mm
Neoprene: StretchFlight 2
Internal Lining: WarmFlight thermal fleece
Seams: Taped/Sealed
Entry System / Zipper: Back Zip
Hood: No Hood
Knee Pads: Supratex
Model Year: 2021/2022
Materials: 88% Recycled Polyester, 12% Elastane
Manufacturer's Part Number: ERJW103085
PRODUCT FEATURES
Increased warmth and comfort without sacrificing flexibility
Thermal Smoothie durable textured neoprene, retains heat and blocks wind [chest and back]
24% less CO2 emissions per wetsuit
Limestone-derivate eco-friendly neoprene made from scrap rubber tires and Bluesign® certified
Lining keeps body heat in and water out [chest]
Triple glued and blind stitched [GBS] seams reduce sew-throughs and water entry
StretchFlight 3 Taped internal seals makes all seams watertight
Water-based glue used for lamination
Recycled polyester and nylon used for linings
Back zip entry system with YKK® 10 plastic zip
Knee pads durable, lightweight and flexible
Glideskin neck seal
Hydrowrap x2 adjustable neck closure with hydrosheild water barrier
Print placement may differ from one wetsuit to another
Product appearance may differ slightly depending on print placement
MANUFACTURER'S DESCRIPTION

It's all about where your mind is when you're out on the water. This 4/3mm Syncro wetsuit does it all, so you can focus on shredding like a true ROXY girl. A blend of recycled StretchFlight 2 neoprene and WarmFlight® thermal fleece lining keep your body temperature just right without sacrificing the flexibility you need. Slip in and out with ease thanks to the back YKK® 10 plastic zip closure.

name: Women's Epic 4/3 Back Zip Wetsuit
description:
Cleanline Staff
Matt Says:

"The Women's Epic 4/3 has been a best seller for years, and now with the upgrade to Ultraflex Neoprene, it is an even better pick. O'Neill makes higher-end Women's suits, but the Epic for the price is hard to beat. Smooth skin chest panels for added wind resistance and heat retention, a rolled neck for comfort, back zip for ease of entry, and GBS seams make this a well rounded suit at an affordable price. Depending on air temps and your personal preference we suggest this one for anyone in waters 55 to 65 degrees."

The Women's Epic has many of the same great features as O'Neill's high-end wetsuits, including 100% UltraFlex neoprene, double seal neck closure, LSD (lumbar seamless design) and re-engineered covert blackout zip. Clean graphics and sharp style lines make the Epic the best value in the industry.

DETAILS
Thickness: 4/3mm
Neoprene: UltraFlex
Zipper: Back Zip
Hood: No Hood
Model Year: 2022/2023
Manufacturers Part Number: 4214
PRODUCT FEATURES
Strategic Seamless Paddle Zones
Double Super Seal Neck
External Key Pocket with Loop
Hand-Cuff Stitch Sleeve Anchor
Krypto Knee Padz
FluidFlex (tm) Firewall
Glued and Blindstitched Seams
VIDEO

name: Women's Hyperfreak Fire 4/3+ Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
Keep your inner fire ignited with the Women's O'Neill Hyperfreak Fire 4/3+ Chest Zip Wetsuit. It prioritizes extreme warmth with the Technobutter 4 (TB4) Firewall while still having all the great features of the classic Hyperfreak. To optimize strength and heat, the TB4 is the next level up from the Technobutter 3. Recycled yarn in the internal liner is infused with graphene, creating a recirculating, fire-hot feedback loop with body heat. This new technology, combined with the exterior fluid seam weld, will stay red-hot, even on the coldest days.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 4/3mm+
Front / Back / Thigh / Butt: TB4 Firewall
Shoulder / Shin / Calf: TechnoButter 4
Entry / Sleeves: TechnoButter 4X
Entry System / Zipper: Chest Zip
Hood: No Hood
Model Year: 2022/2023
MPN: 5520
PRODUCT FEATURES
F.U.Z.E. Closure (Chest Zip)
360 degree Barrier With Drainholes and Anti-Flush Barrier (F.U.Z.E.)
Tapered Cuffs with Segmented 3D Wrist and Ankle Seals
Recycled Oyster Shells and Eco Carbon Black Infused Neoprene
Redzone Water Resistant Zipper
Recycled Dope-Dyed Yarn Jersey
Aqua Alpha Solvent Free Neoprene Lamination
Key Pocket with Loop
Triple Glued and Blindstitched with Exterior Fluid Seam Weld Technology
PLUS (+) = 0.5mm Extra thickness for even more warmth
ADDITIONAL INFO

O'Neill uses recycled ocean oyster shells in place of calcium carbonate powder which comprises approximately 10% of their neoprene. O’Neill worked with their key manufacturing partner to develop a non-solvent based lamination glue called “aqua-alpha”. Aqua alpha reduces solvent usage by 600 grams per wetsuit compared to traditional laminating glues. Eliminates harmful VOCs and has the same durability as conventional, solvent-based Wetsuit glues. From recycled polybags to 100% recycled paper and soy based inks hang tags. Conserving water, energy and virgin materials. 100% digital catalogs. Dope-dying infusion produces colored yarns without the dyeing process. This saves tremendous amounts of water while reducing energy consumption and water pollution (up to 80%). 26% carbon emission is reduced for every kg of fabric. Every blueprint full suit saves more than 1 lb/0.5 kg of harmful plastic from potentially polluting the world’s living oceans. Carbon black is one of the key ingredients in neoprene. It can now be carbonized from scrap rubber tires using high heat to extract. 72% carbon emission declined. O’Neill’s advanced repair facility prolongs the life cycle of their product, keeping their wetsuit out of the landfill longer.



PRODUCT CONSTRUCTION

TB4 AIR FIREWALL
The next great thermal breakthrough was made better with trapped pockets of air. TB4 Air Firewall uses a special lamination process paired with a core of aerated neoprene and a graphene fiber jersey to create the toastiest conditions. Take summer with you.

TB4 FIREWALL
The all new Technobutter 4 Firewall utilizes the recycled graphene fibers at a thicker pile to create a fire hot feedback loop. As the body heat warms the graphene fibers they conduct the heat back into the body.

TECHNOBUTTER 4X
Technobutter 4x goes beyond the gooey stretch, and soft feel of TB3x. Recycled graphene fibers line the jersey allowing for incredible stretch with added strength and warmth retention, all with a new look.

TECHNOBUTTER 4
TB4 builds on the legendary Technobutter 3, the next evolution of the jersey introduces recycled yarns infused with graphene for increased wear strength and heat retention.

MANUFACTURER’S DESCRIPTION

The O'Neill Hyperfreak Fire range focuses on extreme warmth, high performance, increased durability, and comfort. All-new sustainable, buttery soft, heat recirculating TechnoButter 4 materials line each suit. These technologically advanced materials plus water-tight Fluid Seam construction have created a new cold water legend. Fire red-hot heat takes the innovative Hyperfreak legacy to the next level.

name: Women's Seven Seas 4/3 Back Zip Wetsuit
description:
The Sisstrevolution Women’s Seven Seas 4/3 Back Zip wetsuit is a game changer when surfing in cool water. Step into the flexible 100% Super Stretch neoprene via the back zip entry and feel the warmth and comfort of the Thermal Stretch lining, located where it matters most: in the torso and upper leg. Stay toasty warm with the maximum water seal Super Stretch Neo 3.0 tape lining the internal seams.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 4/3mm
Neoprene: 100% Super stretch Japanese limestone
Internal Lining: Thermal Stretch
Seams: Sealed/Taped
Entry System / Zipper: Back Zip
Hood: No Hood
Key Pocket: Key Cord
Knee Pads: Yes
Model Year: 2021/2022
Manufacturer's Part Number: GN7S43BZS
PRODUCT FEATURES
Dope Dyed Fabric
Warmth and Stretch
Durable and Watertight
Triple glued, blind stitched seams
Sisstr super stretch Neo 3.0 tape
Liquid tape cuff seals to prevent flushing at cuffs
Glideskin on the neck seals to skin to prevent flushing
Made by Bluesign approved mills
MANUFACTURER'S DESCRIPTION

Everything you need in a wetsuit and nothing you don’t with the ease of a back zip. Using 100% super stretch Japanese limestone based neoprene. It's lighter, warmer, softer, stretchier, easier to put on and take off, and allows for more freedom of movement. Featuring the thermal stretch lining insulates heat with softer, eco-friendly, anti-fade stretch jersey laminated. A short back zipper features the double layer Thermal Flush Barrier entry which blocks out water for maximum warmth. Sisstr super stretch Neo 3.0 tape allows for maximum seam sealing while having unrestricted stretch and comfortThe AquaA eco-friendly water-based lamination is completely solvent free. Most Importantly, enjoy!

name: Women's Dawn Patrol 4/3 Back Zip Wetsuit
description:
Rip Curl has some of the best women riders on their team so its no surprise that their suits offer unparalleled warmth and stretch in designs that keep you strong and confident in the water. The Rip Curl Women's Dawn Patrol 4/3 Back Zip Wetsuit is a great entry-level wetsuit for its combined performance features of warmth and durability and the back zip entry system is slightly easier than a chest zip if you're new to getting in and out of a wetsuit. This model also includes a batwing system providing a barrier between back zip and body to minimize leakage and flushing.

This wetsuit has many of hte high end features of Rip Curls Ultimate suits including E5 Flash Lining, E5 neoprene, and E4 Thermoflex Lining. The large front and back panels of E5 flash lining is the world's fastest drying. This paired with the E4 Thermo will keep you warm and comfortable. High stress areas are secured with E5 tape to keep you as confident in the long term durability of the suit as you are comfortable in the water.

DETAILS
Thickness: 4/3mm
Neoprene: E5
Internal Lining: E5 Flash Lining and E4 Thermo
Seams: Sealed/Taped
Zipper: Back Zip
Hood: None
Model Year: 2020/2021
Manufacturers Part Number: WSM9QW / WSM9HS
PRODUCT FEATURES
Premium E5 neoprene is lightweight and provides 10% more warmth than E4 with 30% more stretch and is 20% lighter
Performance high stretch E5 tape is applied to high stress areas covering 3/4 of the seams for increased strength and durability
Front and back panels of E5 Flash lining are fast drying, warm, and hihg-stretch
E4 Thermo lining provides warmth and is high stretch
Easy back zip entry system with an adjustable collar and a water resistant offset steel head zipper with urethane coating
Batwing system keeps you comfortable separating the back zip from your body while also preventing leakage and flushing
Highly waterproof triple glued and blindstitched seams that are stretchy and comfortable
E5 tape on high stress points

name: Women's Dawn Patrol 4/3 Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
The Rip Curl Women's Dawn Patrol 4/3 Chest Zip Wetsuit offers performance and warmth features along with durability and great value. It has many of the high-end features that you would find in Rip Curl's Ultimate wetsuits including all over E5 neoprene which is warmer, lighter and has 30% more stretch than E4. This suit also features front and back panels of quick drying E5 Flash lining paired with E4 Thermoflex lining providing comfortable stretch. For durability E5 tape is added to high-stress points, a major bonus for keeping water out and enforcing the strength and warmth of this high performance wetsuit. The chest zip entry system allows for easy entry with a low profile and helps prevent blow outs.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 4/3mm
Neoprene: E5
Internal Lining: E5 Flash + E4 Thermoflex
Seams: Sealed/Taped
Zipper: Chest Zip
Hood: No Hood
Model Year: 2021/2022
Manufacturers Part Number: WSM9BS, WSM9NW
PRODUCT FEATURES
Front and Back panels of E5 Flash lining that funnel water rapidly out of your suit
E5 Neoprene 30% more stretch, 20% lighter, and 10% warmer than E4
E5 Tape added to high stress points for increased strength and durability
E4 Thermoflex combined with E4 neoprene for added stretch and warmth
Easy top-entry chest zip with a lightweight zipper that is low profile and prevents blow outs
VIDEO

name: Women's Psycho Tech 4/3+ Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
Get psyched while surfing in the O'Neill Women's Psycho Tech 4/3 chest zip wetsuit. The suit ultimately focuses on warmth and durability. The sustainable TB4 Firewall technology from O’Neil retains and recirculates heat. O’Neil uses recycled ocean oyster shells and Aqua Alpha Solvent Free Neoprene Lamination to help reduce product emissions. The Psycho Tech is O’Neill’s premier wetsuit and has a cult following of enthusiasts who love it for its high-performance technology and performance.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 4/3mm+
Chest / Back: TB4 Duraskin Air Firewall
Thigh / Butt / Shins / Calf: TB4 Firewall
Arms / Shoulders: TechnoButter 4
Entry: TechnoButter 4X
Entry System / Zipper: Chest Zip
Hood: No Hood
Model Year: 2022/2023
MPN: 5507
PRODUCT FEATURES
F.U.Z.E. Closure (Chest Zip)
360 degree Barrier With Drainholes (F.U.Z.E.)
Super Seal Cuffs with Plasma Wrist and Ankle Seals
Recycled Oyster Shells and Eco Carbon Black Infused Neoprene
Redzone Water Resistant Zipper
Recycled Dope-Dyed Yarn Jersey
Aqua Alpha Solvent Free Neoprene Lamination
Key Pocket with Loop
Stitchless Exterior Fluid Seam Weld Technology with Interior Recycled TBX Tape
PLUS (+) = 0.5mm Extra thickness for even more warmth
ADDITIONAL INFO

O'Neill uses recycled ocean oyster shells in place of calcium carbonate powder which comprises approximately 10% of their neoprene. O’Neill worked with their key manufacturing partner to develop a non-solvent based lamination glue called “aqua-alpha”. Aqua alpha reduces solvent usage by 600 grams per wetsuit compared to traditional laminating glues. Eliminates harmful VOCs and has the same durability as conventional, solvent-based Wetsuit glues. From recycled polybags to 100% recycled paper and soy based inks hang tags. Conserving water, energy and virgin materials. 100% digital catalogs. Dope-dying infusion produces colored yarns without the dyeing process. This saves tremendous amounts of water while reducing energy consumption and water pollution (up to 80%). 26% carbon emission is reduced for every kg of fabric. Every blueprint full suit saves more than 1 lb/0.5 kg of harmful plastic from potentially polluting the world’s living oceans. Carbon black is one of the key ingredients in neoprene. It can now be carbonized from scrap rubber tires using high heat to extract. 72% carbon emission declined. O’Neill’s advanced repair facility prolongs the life cycle of their product, keeping their wetsuit out of the landfill longer.



PRODUCT CONSTRUCTION

TB4 AIR FIREWALL
The next great thermal breakthrough was made better with trapped pockets of air. TB4 Air Firewall uses a special lamination process paired with a core of aerated neoprene and a graphene fiber jersey to create the toastiest conditions. Take summer with you.

TB4 FIREWALL
The all new Technobutter 4 Firewall utilizes the recycled graphene fibers at a thicker pile to create a fire hot feedback loop. As the body heat warms the graphene fibers they conduct the heat back into the body.

TECHNOBUTTER 4X
Technobutter 4x goes beyond the gooey stretch, and soft feel of TB3x. Recycled graphene fibers line the jersey allowing for incredible stretch with added strength and warmth retention, all with a new look.

TECHNOBUTTER 4
TB4 builds on the legendary Technobutter 3, the next evolution of the jersey introduces recycled yarns infused with graphene for increased wear strength and heat retention.

MANUFACTURER’S DESCRIPTION

O'Neill's Psycho Tech range focuses on ultimate warmth and durability with high-performance recycled materials and water-tight double-sealed stitchless seams. Sustainable TB4 Firewall technology radiates throughout with TB4 Duraskin Air Firewall in the chest and back to shield against the cold while retaining and recirculating your body heat. Designed to keep you in the water longer, toasty, and stoked.

name: Women's Synergy 4/3 Back Zip Wetsuit
description:
If staying warm is your top priority, take a look at the Billabong Women’s Synergy 4/3 Back Zip wetsuit. Built for cold water, the Nobel Prize-winning Graphene material is placed in the chest and back liner which warms up quickly and has heat-producing properties to stay comfortable while waiting for the next set to come through. Partially recycled Superlight Foam neoprene has a soft buttery feel while maintaining an impressive flexible feel. The seams are pieced together with a non-toxic Superflex tape and glued and blind stitched external seams. Climb in the easy-to-use back zip entry and sprint out to the water in no time without breaking the bank.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 4/3mm
Neoprene: Superlight Foam
Exterior Fabric: 100% Recycled PRO STRETCH!
Interior Fabric: Graphene and Silicone Stretch
Exterior Seams: GBS
Interior Seams: Superflex Neo tape
Entry System / Zipper: Back Zip
Sleeves: Long
Hood: No Hood
Materials: 80% Neoprene, 10% Nylon, 10% Polyester
Model Year: 2022/2023
Style Number: ABJW100133
PRODUCT FEATURES
Best Value and Performance Option
Women's Long Sleeve Full Wetsuit
Synergy Wetsuit Series
Taped Internal Seams
Glued and Blindstitched seams
100% Recycled Fibers In and out
ADDITIONAL INFO

GRAPHENE RECYLCER +
Warmth and Performance of Graphene. Infused with 100% recycled fibers lining the entire interior of the suit.

SUPERFLEX RECYCLER +
100% recycled fibers, combined with Superlight foam is lightweight, eco-friendly and provides great thermal retention with 20% increased stretch.

PRO STRETCH
New Improved stretch, 100% recycled fibers. Recycled pro stretch neoprene nylon blend exterior fabric.

SUPERLIGHT FOAM
Partially recycled, upcycled car tires and neoprene scraps combine to create great thermal retention with a high-stretch combination.

SMART FOAM
Superior thermal retention, made using partially recycled, Premium light weight materials. SMART Foam limestone-based with 30% recycled car tires, scrap rubber & oyster shells.

GRAPHENE
The warmth and performance of Nobel prize-winning Graphene is heat-generating material infused and combined with Silicone Stretch — 100% recycled fibers. Graphene-infused yarns warm up faster and hold heat longer.

SILICON STRETCH JERSEY
The ideal blend of flexibility and thermal retention - Billabong's new soft silicon stretch internal jersey is made from 100% recycled fibers and combined with an eco-friendly Superlight foam.

SUPER-FLEX NEO TAPE
The internal machine applied Super-flex neo tape keeps the warmth in and the water out.

AQUA ALPHA
Aqua Alpha water-based nontoxic glues are used exclusively to bond Billabong wetsuit materials.

MANUFACTURER'S DESCRIPTION

The Synergy Series wetsuits deliver lightweight, premium heat, and innovative technology with superior value and durability. Made from stretchy and eco-conscious Superlight neoprene combined with glued and blind stitched sealed external seams, the women’s 4/3 Synergy Back Zip Full Wetsuit boasts excellent thermal retention. Graphene recycler lining at the front and back panels adds incredible strength and heat without adding bulk, while silicone stretch panels at the arms and legs let you get in and out with ease. Finished with a back zip entry, the Synergy delivers everything you demand from a premium wetsuit, without breaking the bank.

name: Women's Salty Dayz 4/3 Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
Style and eco-friendly materials are sprinkled throughout the Billabong Women’s Salty Dayz 4/3 Hooded Chest Zip wetsuit. Billabong’s namesake Graphene Recycler Plus liner combined with Silicon Stretch interior fabric make for a remarkably warm and comfortable wetsuit. The partially recycled Superlight Foam is made from up-cycled tires for a flexible and lightweight feel. Internally, the suit features Super-Flex Neo Tape to seal out the cold water, while the Glued and Blind Stitched seams ensure flexibility from top to bottom.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 4/3mm
Neoprene: SMART Foam
Exterior Fabric: 100% recycled PRO STRETCH!
Interior Fabric: Graphene Comp
Exterior Seams: GBS
Internal Seams: Superflex Neo Yape
Sleeves: Long
Entry System / Zip: Chest
Hood: Attached
Materials: 80% Neoprene, 10% Nylon, 10% Polyester
Model Year: 2022/2023
MPN: ABJW200103
PRODUCT FEATURES
Style and Performance
Women's Long Sleeve Full Hooded Wetsuit
Surf Capsule Wetsuit Series
Superlight Foam, Partially recycled
Dislocating chest zip entry prevents zip failure
Side panel for a pop of color
100% Recycled Fibers Inside And Out
ADDITIONAL INFO

GRAPHENE RECYLCER +
Warmth and Performance of Graphene. Infused with 100% recycled fibers lining the entire interior of the suit.

SUPERFLEX RECYCLER +
100% recycled fibers, combined with Superlight foam is lightweight, eco-friendly and provides great thermal retention with 20% increased stretch.

SILICON STRETCH JERSEY
The ideal blend of flexibility and thermal retention - Billabong's new soft silicon stretch internal jersey is made from 100% recycled fibers and combined with an eco-friendly Superlight foam.

SMART FOAM
Superior thermal retention, made using partially recycled, Premium light weight materials. SMART Foam limestone-based with 30% recycled car tires, scrap rubber & oyster shells.

PRO STRETCH RECYCLER
New improved soft silicone stretch jersey made using 100% recycled fibers. The 100% recycled stretch neoprene nylon blend exterior fabric fibers in the Billabong Pro Stretch jerseys maximize sustainability and stretch where you need it most.

GRAPHENE COMP
Competition stretch infused with Nobel prize winning Graphene. Billabong's most flexible, warmest material to date.

SUPER-FLEX NEO TAPE
The internal machine applied Super-flex neo tape keeps the warmth in and the water out.

AQUA ALPHA
Aqua Alpha water-based nontoxic glues are used exclusively to bond Billabong wetsuit materials.

MANUFACTURER'S DESCRIPTION

Stand out in the line-up with signature style and progressive performance. Equipped with Billabong wetsuit technology, including a chest zip and Graphene Recycler thermal lining at the internal chest and back panels, combined with silicon stretch lining at the lower legs and sleeves, the Surf Capsule Collection women’s full suit is customized with palm printed panels. Combining style, performance, and sustainability, the 4/3 Salty Dayz Hooded Full Wetsuit is now made with stretchy and eco-conscious Superlight neoprene and water-based adhesives.

name: Women's Swell Series 4/3 Back Zip Wetsuit
description:
The Roxy Women’s Swell Series 4/3 wetsuit is constructed for immense warmth and protection through StretchFlight and thermal lining. Roxy created this suit using Xtra-stretch tape, GBS glue, water-based glue, and GlideSkin. These features combined created a high-performance masterpiece. Roxy is also using Recycled polyester and nylon for the lining of the Swell Series to lower environmental impact.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 4/3mm
Fabric: Eco StretchFlight
Thermal Lining: Eco sleek WarmFlight® at bust (front, sides, back) and wrist
Entry System / Zipper: Back Zip
Hood: No Hood
Materials: 88% Recycled Polyester, 12% Elastane
Model Year: 2022/2023
Style: ERJW103124
PRODUCT FEATURES
GBS glued and blind stitched seams
Xtra-stretch taped at front, back and top legs
Water based glue used for lamination
Recycled polyester and nylon used for linings
Back zip entry system with YKK™#10 plastic zip
Supratex knee pads, durable, lightweight & flexible
GlideSkin neck seal
Key loop on outer left leg
Print placement may differ slightly
MANUFACTURER’S DESCRIPTION

Zip into action with this long sleeve wetsuit for women. Part of the Swell Series, the high-performance design features a StretchFlight and thermal lining construction for immense warmth and protection. Complete with a GlideSkin neck seal to keep water out.

name: Women's Ninja 4/3 Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
The O'Neill Women's Ninja 4/3mm Chest Zip Wetsuit is part of the new Ninja series from O’Neill. The Ninja Series offers high-end quality features and exceptional durability at an affordable price. The 3/2 Ninja Chest Zip is made up of UltraFlex neoprene for freedom of movement. The suit has DL FluidFlex Firewall insulation in the torso and upper legs for insulation. Lastly, the suit is internally sealed using Ultraflex taped seams. Throw in O’Neill’s beloved F.U.Z.E entry system and a watertight double super seal neck closure you are left with an amazing suit at a competitive price.

DETAILS
Thickness: 4/3mm
Neoprene: UltraFlex neoprene
Zipper: Chest Zip
Hood: None
Model Year: 2021/2022
Manufacturers Part Number: 5473
PRODUCT FEATURES
Ultraflex sleeves, entry , top shoulder, side panel and low legs for max flexibility
Internal ultraflex taped seams throughout most of the suit for better seal
F.U.Z.E. Closure (Front Upper Zip Entry)
Strategic Seamless Paddle Zones
Double Super Seal Neck
External Key Pocket with Loop
Hand-Cuff Stitch Sleeve Anchor
Krypto Knee Padz
Triple Blindstitched and Glued seams in sleeves for maximum flexibility
DL fluid flex firewall chest for enhanced durability
Dl Fluidflex Firewall thigh and butt for additional warmth
Ultraflex sleeves, entry, top shoulder, side panel and low legs for max flexibility
MANUFACTURER'S DESCRIPTION

New for 2021 The Ninja Series offers high end quality features, exceptional durability and lasting value. Featuring UltraFlex neoprene for freedom of moment, DL FluidFlex Firewall insulation, internal Ultraflex taped seams and water tight double super seal neck closure. Clean style lines and color blocking complete this well balanced, value packed series.

name: Women's Flashbomb 4/3 Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
The Women's Flashbomb 4/3 Chest Zip wetsuit is now equipped E6 neoprene, fast drying E6 Flash lining, and E6 Flash Lining Tape. This suit provides unparalleled stretch, warmth and comfort in and out of the water. Rip Curl's E6 neoprene is 20% lighter than E4 while providing 30% more stretch so it won't compromise your mobility and flexibility while paddling out and catching a wave. The seams are also taped with E6 Flash Lining tape for extra comfort and water seam sealing. Perfect for cold water, this suit also utilizes mesh skin panels to absorb solar rays and reduce windchill. he Flash Bomb is our top-selling women's suit in the Rip Curl lineup, and with these updated features we're sure you'll love it for its warmth, technical features, and quick-drying ability.

DETAILS
Thickness: 4/3mm
Neoprene: E6
Internal Lining: E6 Flash
Seams: Sealed/Taped
Zipper: Chest Zip
Hood: No Hood
Model Year: 2021/2022
Manufacturers Part Number: WSTYF
PRODUCT FEATURES
Premium high stretch E6 neoprene. 20% lighter and 30% more stretch than E4
E6 Flash Lining has 20% more stretch and then E5 and is now equal to Rip Curls Ultimate stretch neoprene, now with added warmth and still fast drying
Ultimate stretch E6 Flash Lining tape for a water tight seal providing warmth and comfort
Smooth mesh skin panels that absorb solar rays and reduce wind chill
Sealed cuffs
Easy top entry system with lightweight zipper for chest zip closure

name: Women's Omega 4/3 Back Zip Wetsuit
description:
The Women's Omega 4/3mm Wetsuit is a perfect introductory suit at an affordable price. Rip Curl incorporates high-end features such as; E5 and E3 neoprene, mesh skin panels, a hydro-loc collar, and E5 stress point tape to ensure comfort, warmth, and stretch. The back zip entry system makes it easy to get in and out of this suit, and with the added Batwing there is a barrier between your body and the zipper to keep you comfortable and prevent leakage and flushing. The hydro-loc collar is made of neoprene and further prevents leaking, while effectively holding up the batwing.

The economical price of this suit doesn't hinder the quality! The triple glued and double stitched seams don't fully penetrate the neoprene, allowing for a waterproof seam with high stretch. E5 stress point tape is used to enforce the critical neoprene panel junctions, increasing the durability of this suit, so you don't have to worry about wearing out this piece of equipment with how often you will want to wear it in the water.

DETAILS
Thickness: 4/3mm
Neoprene: E5/E3
Zipper: Back Zip
Hood: No Hood
Model Year: 2021/2022
Manufacturers Part Number: WSM9CW
PRODUCT FEATURES
Easy back zip entry system
Adjustable collar
Designed with a water resistant steel head zipper with offset teeth and urethane coating
Batwing System prevents leakage and flushing between the body and back zipper
Smooth mesh skin panels in the chest and that absorbs the suns solar rays for increased warmth
Highly waterproof triple glued and blindstitched seams that are stretchy and comfortable
ADDITIONAL INFO

Premium E5 neoprene is lightweight and provides 10% more warmth than E4 with 30% more stretch and is 20% lighter: used in the arms. Premium E3 neoprene is standard high stretch and lightweight with high durability properties: used in the core and legs. Increased durability with E5 stress point taping at critical neoprene junctions. The Omega incorporates some high–end features including E5 Neoprene and E3 Neoprene at an economical price.

name: Women's Synergy 4/3 Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
The Women’s 4/3 Synergy Chest Zip Wetsuit from Billabong is designed for those who seek lightweight, premium warmth and performance. Reap all of these benefits without having to break your wallet; this wetsuit boasts stretchy neoprene fabric with glued & blind stitched sealed external seams and a graphene recycler lining at the front & back panels that boosts strength while trapping in heat. Silicone-stretch arm & leg panels make it easy to slide into or out of while being mindful towards sustainability as well!

Warmth and Performance of Graphene. Infused with 100% recycled fibers lining the entire interior of the suit.

100% recycled fibers, combined with Superlight foam is lightweight, eco-friendly and provides great thermal retention with 20% increased stretch.

SUPERLIGHT FOAM
Partially recycled, upcycled car tires and neoprene scraps combine to create great thermal retention with a high-stretch combination.

SILICON STRETCH JERSEY
The ideal blend of flexibility and thermal retention - Billabong's new soft silicon stretch internal jersey is made from 100% recycled fibers and combined with an eco-friendly Superlight foam.

GRAPHENE LINING
The warmth and performance of Nobel prize-winning Graphene is heat-generating material infused and combined with Silicone Stretch — 100% recycled fibers. Graphene-infused yarns warm up faster and hold heat longer.

PRO STRETCH

The internal machine applied Super-flex neo tape keeps the warmth in and the water out.

Aqua Alpha water-based nontoxic glues are used exclusively to bond Billabong wetsuit materials.

The Synergy Series wetsuits deliver lightweight, premium heat and innovative technology with superior value and durability. Made from stretchy and eco-conscious Superlight neoprene combined with glued and blind stitched sealed external seams, the women’s wetsuit boasts excellent thermal retention. Graphene recycler lining at the front and back panels adds incredible strength and heat without adding bulk, while silicone stretch panels at the arms and legs let you get in and out with ease. Finished with a chest zip entry, the 4/3 Synergy Full Wetsuit delivers everything you demand from a premium wetsuit, without breaking the bank.

name: Women's R3 Yulex 4.5/3.5 Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
Patagonia’s completely redesigned their women’s wetsuits, which now feature a breezy asymmetrical entrance (they slide on and off with ease), a new fit and an ultra-soft 100% recycled polyester internal lining that feels like a second skin. The Women’s 4.5m/3.5mm R2® Yulex® Front-Zip is for water in the 48-55 degrees Fahrenheit range. This is for the surfer who wants to get in the water faster, surf longer and wear a suit that leaves a lighter impact on the environment than ever before.

The new suits feature an updated patterning across the back shoulder seam for ease of motion while paddling; a wider, lower-profile internal seam tape for utmost comfort; new 100% recycled, ultra-soft polyester arm and leg linings that saves 18 water bottles per suit; 100% recycled spandex in the external and internal thermal linings; AQUAa water-based glue; and, solution-dyed linings. They’re still constructed from a neoprene-free blend of 85% Yulex® natural rubber from sources that are FSC® certified by the Rainforest Alliance (meaning the forest of hevea trees––the source of the rubber––doesn’t come from a newly cut rainforest) and 15% synthetic rubber by polymer content. All Patagonia’s wetsuits are Fair Trade Certified™ sewn (the only Fair Trade Certified™ wetsuits in the industry, by the way).

DETAILS
Thickness: 4.5/3.5mm
Neoprene: Yulex/Synthetic Rubber
Internal Lining: Recycled Polyester Jersey
Seams: Sealed/Taped
Zipper: Chest Zip
Hood: None
Model Year: 2020/2021
Manufacturers Part Number: 88531
PRODUCT FEATURES
Made with neoprene-free Yulex; natural rubber/chlorine-free synthetic rubber that meets rigorous standards for performance, durability, warmth and sustainability
Yulex is natural and sustainably tapped from hevea trees in Guatemala that are FSC (Forest Stewardship Council) certified
Torso/thighs: 4.5mm of 85% Yulex pure natural rubber/15% synthetic rubber
Arms/legs: 3.5mm of 85% Yulex pure natural rubber/15% synthetic rubber
Torso/thighs have solution-dyed 95% polyester (51% recycled)/5% spandex inverted microgrid thermal lining that minimizes weight, dries fast and offers excellent flexibility
Solution-dyed, high-stretch 100% recycled polyester jersey lining in the arms/legs improves flexibility and dry time; solution-dyed exterior face fabric made with 85% recycled polyester/15% spandex is durable, stretchy and water-resistant. Lining and face fabric laminated with solvent-free AquaA glue
100% external seam sealing; all seams are triple glued and internally taped
Supratex kneepads and ankle cuffs for maximum durability and anatomic fit
Floating, asymmetrical front-zip with corrosion-proof Salmi zipper provides better seal and extends suit’s lifespan; unlike other designs, zipper is replaceable
Easy-access key loop
Made in a Fair Trade Certified facility
Made in Thailand
1106 g (39 oz)

High-tech features like the Graphene liner provide unmatched warmth while paddling out in the morning chill. Climb into the water-tight chest zip entry which is simple to navigate with the chest panel designed with a generous opening. External glued and blind stitched seams along with Super Flex neo tape on the inside ensure watertight seams resulting in a warmer suit.

name: Women's Flashbomb E7 HeatSeeker 4/3 Zip Free Wetsuit
description:
Catch a wave in a flash with the Women’s Flashbomb E7 HeatSeeker 4/3 Zip Free Wetsuit. Combining the new E7 Flash Lining throughout the wetsuit and a unique version of 2 Flex Energy, a revolutionary suit has been created. With superior technical features, the Flashbomb Heat Seeker is Rip Curl’s warmest and stretchiest Flashbomb wetsuit ever created.

The new Women's Flashbomb Heat Seeker 4/3 Zip Free fullsuit is Rip Curl's most technically advanced cold water wetsuit to date. Combining all new E7 Flash Lining through out the wetsuit and our unique version 2 Flex Energy, a revolutionary lining on the back and shoulders that generates even more heat when stretched. As you move through the water, the Flex Energy lining will activate and heat your wetsuit. E7 Flash Lining High Stretch hand tape for Ultimate comfort, stretch and performance. Zip Free technology offers light, unrestricted performance and efficient design for maximum stretch, warmth, and comfort. Triple glued, double stitched (Glued & Blindstitched) seam does not fully penetrate neoprene allowing for a waterproof seam with high stretch and comfort. Plus many more superior technical features, the Flashbomb Heat Seeker is our warmest and stretchiest Flashbomb ever.

name: Women's Furnace Comp 4/3 Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
To stay warm and perform your best, you need a wetsuit that's lightweight, super flexible, and built to handle the action. The 4/3 Women's Furnace Comp Series Chest Zip Full Wetsuit rises to the challenge with AIRLITE 4D exterior, a SMART foam core, and a technical Graphene interior. Reinforced with Super-flex taped seams. Specifically designed for cold water, loaded with the latest features all designed to keep you the warmest most comfortable possible.

Sleeves: Long
Entry System / Zip: Chest

Model Year: 2022/2023

PRODUCT FEATURES
Warmest Wetsuit Billabong Makes
Women's Long Sleeve Full Wetsuit
Furnace Comp Wetsuit Series
Graphene-Fueled Warmth
Geared for Competition
DryMax Entry System keeps water out
Dislocating Chest Zip entry prevents zip failure
Minimal Seams = Maximum Flex
100% Recycled Fibers In and Out
ADDITIONAL INFO

AIRLITE
A new and improved Airlite stretch using 100% recycled fibers.

AIRLITE 4D
The next dimension in lightweight stretch, engineered where you need it most — Ultimate flexibility sleeves and under-sleeve. AIRLITE 4D Infuses Graphene fibers into Billabong's already incredible Airlite liners. The result? Not only will it make you warmer, faster for longer, it's 10% lighter, has more than a 20% increase in stretch and - best of all - it's 100% recycled. Combine this with a lighter, softer, more elastic outer jersey, and you get AIRLITE 4D: the next dimension in lightweight stretch. Made from 100% recycled P.E.T. fibers & engineered for lightweight flexibility.

AIRLITE RECYCLER
The Billabong Airlite stretch jersey is now made from 100% recycled fibers. Combined with the Billabong smart foam, it's lightweight, eco-friendly and provides the highest thermal retention.

name: Women's E-Bomb 4/3 Zip Free Wetsuit
description:
Rip Curl's E-Bomb ultimate super stretch high performance wetsuit is now made with the latest E6 neoprene. This suit has 25% more stretch and is 15% lighter than suits made with E5 neoprene. The E6 Thermo Lining throughout the entire suit is fast drying, warm, and has a comfortable stretch. E6 tape and stress point hand taping ensures the durability of the E-Bomb so you can keep it as your go to, and get out on the water often. The zip free technology offers light, unrestricted performance and efficient design for maximum stretch warmth, and comfort. This wetsuit is perfect for keeping you mobile throughout the seasons and in cold water. Enjoy your paddling freedom with the new underarm torpedo gusset panel which provide increased comfort and improved fit.

DETAILS
Thickness: 4/3mm
Neoprene: E6
Internal Lining: E6 Thermo
Zipper: Zip Free
Hood: None
Model Year: 2021/2022
MPN: WSMYIG
PRODUCT FEATURES
100% premium E6 neoprene for ultimate lightweight flexibility
Zip free entry
E6 Therno lining that offers 20% more stretch, is 15% lighter and 10% warmer than E5
Internal E6 tape for unrestricted performance paired with stress point taping for increased durability
Sealed cuffs
Strategically designed Torpedo underarm gussets to boost range of motion and underarm fit

name: Women's RBZ Stealth Mode 4/3 Back Zip Wetsuit
description:
Feel like a true surfing ninja in the Women's RBZ Stealth Mode 4/3 Back Zip Wetsuit. The back zip creates a quick and efficient entry, allowing more time surfing and less time changing. The environmentally conscious, limestone-based Ninja Neoprene reduces water absorption by 30%, allowing for prolonged sessions. An added feature of integrating rubber seals into the sleeves minimizes flushing and maximizes warmth during cold water sessions.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 4/3mm
Neoprene: Ninja
Seams: Sealed / Taped
Entry System / Zipper: Back Zip
Hood: No Hood
Knee Pads: Yes
Model Year: 2022
MPN: WRBZ0143W
PRODUCT FEATURES
Glued and blind stitched external seams with “Soft Seal” interior seam tape
Neck features smooth skin “Snake Seal”
Wrist and ankle “Sizzle Seal” waterway seals
Supratex Knee Pads
MANUFACTURER’S DESCRIPTION

Don’t trip on the Back-Zip! All zippers were created equal and the RBZ Stealth Mode hammers this point home. Simple to get in and out of, the RBZ Stealth Mode wards off water and protects with an inner water barrier that keeps the cold out—the perfect suit for surfers of all levels.

Ninja Neoprene is the lightest, stretchiest and softest neoprene material in the water. With roughly 30% less water absorption, dries quicker and is limestone— so it’s better for the environment. The glued and blindstitched seams on all neoprene panels are glued together then blindstitched, creating a watertight, flexible seam. Soft seal interior tape is an ultra-soft internal seam tape that reinforces glued and blindstitched seams for a watertight seal and added comfort. Critical seam junctions are reinforced with seam tape for added strength. The ultimate seam seal. Liquid rubber lines the exterior seam, which, combined with the glued and blindstitched seam make the seams completely waterproof. Soft and comfortable Kevlar-like kneepads are tough on the outside, but soft and stretchy on the inside. Smooth rubber seal integrated into the cuffs prevent expansion and keep water out while maximizing comfort. Fluid rubber seal at the neck wrists and ankles help to prevent expansion while keeping water out.

name: Women's Blueprint 4/3+ Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
Promote sustainability with the new O'Neill Women's Blueprint 4/3+ Chest Zip Wetsuit. The Women’s Blueprint 4/3+ offers mind-boggling minimal seams, flexibility, and warmth. O’Neil did a great job at creating an eco-friendly wetsuit. The TB4 Air Firewall technology improves durability and warmth. Altogether, the Women’s Blueprint 4/3 Chest Zip Wetsuit is the warmest, highest-performing sustainable wetsuit to date.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 4/3mm+
Chest / Back / Thigh / Butt: TB4 Air Firewall
Shins / Calf: TB4 Firewall
Sleeves: TB4X Firewall
Entry / Shoulders: TechnoButter 4X
Entry System / Zipper: Chest Zip
Hood: No Hood
Model Year: 2022/2023
MPN: 5501
PRODUCT FEATURES
F.U.Z.E. Closure (Chest Zip)
Redzone Water Resistant Zipper
360 degree Barrier With Drainholes and Anti-Flush Barrier (F.U.Z.E.)
Tapered Cuffs with Plasma Wrist and Ankle Seals
Recycled Oyster Shells and Eco Carbon Black Infused Neoprene
Recycled Dope-Dyed Yarn Jersey
Aqua Alpha Solvent Free Neoprene Lamination
Key Pocket with Loop
Recycled TBX Fully Taped Glued and Blindstitched Seams
PLUS (+) = 0.5mm Extra thickness for even more warmth
ADDITIONAL INFO

O'Neill uses recycled ocean oyster shells in place of calcium carbonate powder which comprises approximately 10% of their neoprene. O’Neill worked with their key manufacturing partner to develop a non-solvent based lamination glue called “aqua-alpha”. Aqua alpha reduces solvent usage by 600 grams per wetsuit compared to traditional laminating glues. Eliminates harmful VOCs and has the same durability as conventional, solvent-based Wetsuit glues. From recycled polybags to 100% recycled paper and soy based inks hang tags. Conserving water, energy and virgin materials. 100% digital catalogs. Dope-dying infusion produces colored yarns without the dyeing process. This saves tremendous amounts of water while reducing energy consumption and water pollution (up to 80%). 26% carbon emission is reduced for every kg of fabric. Every blueprint full suit saves more than 1 lb/0.5 kg of harmful plastic from potentially polluting the world’s living oceans. Carbon black is one of the key ingredients in neoprene. It can now be carbonized from scrap rubber tires using high heat to extract. 72% carbon emission declined. These products are made of Bluesign® approved fabrics and produced in a resource conserving way with a minimum impact on people and the environment. O’Neill’s advanced repair facility prolongs the life cycle of their product, keeping their wetsuit out of the landfill longer.



PRODUCT CONSTRUCTION

TB4 AIR FIREWALL
The next great thermal breakthrough was made better with trapped pockets of air. TB4 Air Firewall uses a special lamination process paired with a core of aerated neoprene and a graphene fiber jersey to create the toastiest conditions. Take summer with you.

TB4 FIREWALL
The all new Technobutter 4 Firewall utilizes the recycled graphene fibers at a thicker pile to create a fire hot feedback loop. As the body heat warms the graphene fibers they conduct the heat back into the body.

TECHNOBUTTER 4X
Technobutter 4x goes beyond the gooey stretch, and soft feel of TB3x. Recycled graphene fibers line the jersey allowing for incredible stretch with added strength and warmth retention, all with a new look.

TECHNOBUTTER 4
TB4 builds on the legendary Technobutter 3, the next evolution of the jersey introduces recycled yarns infused with graphene for increased wear strength and heat retention.

F.U.Z.E. ZIP CLOSURE
Front Upper Zip Entry (chest) uses a free floating zipper panel and anti flush barrier with drain holes to keep you dry and feeling loose.

RECYCLED TBX FULLY TAPED / GBS SEAMS
The lightest, stretchiest neoprene seam tape ever. 0.5mm split-neoprene applied to triple-glued seams with water-based glue to keep you dry and loose. Blind stitched and triple glued to create a watertight seam, for increased durability while allowing the maximum stretch possible in a sealed seam.

MANUFACTURER’S DESCRIPTION

The O'Neill Blueprint range offers mind-boggling minimal seams, flexibility, and warmth. The legacy of innovation continues with the latest exclusive eco-friendly TB4 materials and their most minimalistic panel design yet. The Blueprint uses the ultra-warm and stretchy TechnoButter 4 Firewall to introduce full coverage, including arms, body, and low legs. This is O'Neill's warmest, highest performing sustainable wetsuit to date.

VIDEO

name: Women's RB2 4/3 Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
Perfect for those with extra warm souls, the Women's Buell RB2 4/3 Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit features flexibility and water-tight technology to prolong your session. The limestone-based Ninja Neoprene is eco-friendly and allows 30% less water absorption resulting in a quicker drying time. The glued and blindstitched seams are top-of-the-line, and with the power-lite “Sizzle” seam seal, this suit maintains durability while keeping you toasty warm during your cold water sessions.

The insulated RB2 slant-zip is Buell's warmest, most water tight wetsuit built for barrels. The Slant Zip entry gives you one-sided water seal performance that pushes the limits of a wetsuit’s warmth potential.

Ninja Neoprene is the lightest, stretchiest and softest neoprene material in the water. With roughly 30% less water absorption, dries quicker and is limestone so it’s better for the environment. The suit has glued and blindstitched seams with power-lite “Sizzle” seam seal on the outside. Critical seam junctions are reinforced with seam tape for added strength. The ultimate seam seal. Liquid rubber lines the exterior seam, which, combined with the glued and blindstitched seam make the seams completely waterproof. Soft and comfortable Kevlar-like kneepads are tough on the outside, but soft and stretchy on the inside. Smooth rubber seal integrated into the cuffs prevent expansion and keep water out while maximizing comfort. Fluid rubber seal at the neck wrists and ankles help to prevent expansion while keeping water out. Toasty warm in extreme conditions!

MANUFACTURER’S DESCRIPTION

Sustainability meets stretchable performance in the 4/3 Women's Furnace Natural Series Zipperless Full Wetsuit. 100% neoprene-free, this natural rubber women's wetsuit made from Yulex delivers all the warmth and flexibility you find in a premium wetsuit without the toxic chemicals. This eco and performance-minded wetsuit is backed by Recycler Airlite Stretch jersey lining featuring Ciclo technology, which helps close the loop and reduce plastic pollution in our oceans and landfills. Limitless stretch paves the way for a zipperless entry system for a smooth feel and extra flexibility. Sealed with water-based glues, the Furnace Natural is the most sustainably focused suit you’ll wear.

name: Women's Furnace Comp 4/3 Chest Zip Wetsuit - 2021
description:
Boost your heat and your airs with the 4/3 Women's Furnace Comp Series Chest Zip Full Wetsuit. Delivering on sustainability without sacrifice, this cold-water competition performance wetsuit for women is now made with innovative eco-conscious materials. Geared for competition, the cold water full wetsuit is lined at the front and back panels with incredibly lightweight and strong Graphene-infused yarns, now infused with 100% recycled fibers, keeping you warmer and faster for longer. Made from upcycled car tires, the eco-conscious SMART Foam is topped with AIRLITE Recycler jersey, now made from recycled materials, radically reducing both weight and wind chill. A chest zip entry system allows for an easy on-off. Every layer is constructed with incredible flexibility for optimal performance.

Neoprene: SMART Foam
Exterior Lining: AIRLITE 4D Recycler
Internal Lining: Recycler Plus / Airlite
Seams: Sealed / Taped

Materials: 80% Neoprene, 20% Nylon
Model Year: 2021/2022
MPN: ABJW100125

Women's Long Sleeve Furnace Comp Series Full Wetsuit
AIRLITE 4D Recycler with 20% more stretch
SMART Foam - partially recycled, Premium light weight

name: Women's RBZ Stealth Mode 4/3 Back Zip Wetsuit - 2020
description:
Experience better, faster surfing with the Buell Women's RBZ Stealth Mode 4/3 Back Zip Wetsuit. Save time and enter quicker due to its easy-access back zip design. Plus, don't worry about losing your warmth - Ninja Neoprene, made from limestone, reduces water absorption by 30% for those long days in cooler waters! Add on rubber seals integrated into the sleeves that minimize flushing, and you have a suit fit for true surf ninjas!

DETAILS
Thickness: 4/3 mm
Neoprene: Ninja
Seams: Sealed / Taped
Zipper: Back Zip
Hood: None
Model Year: 2020
Manufacturers Part Number: WRBZ0143W0
PRODUCT FEATURES
Back zip Entry
Glued and blindstitched external seams with “Soft Seal” interior seam tape
Neck features smoothskin “Snake Seal”
Wrist and ankle “Sizzle Seal” waterway seals
Supratex Knee Pads
MANUFACTURER’S DESCRIPTION

Simple to get in and out of, the RBZ Stealth Mode wards off water and protects with an inner water barrier that keeps the cold out—the perfect suit for surfers of all levels.

name: Women's RB2 4/3 Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit - 2020
description:
The Women's 4/3 RB2 Hooded chest zip wetsuit is Buells most water tight wetsuit built for barrels. Featuring Ninja Neoprene, chest and back panels of internal thermal insulation barrier, and a water tight slant zip entry system this wetsiot pushes the limits of warmth potential.

You know that one crazy fool you see waxing up their board before sunrise, even in the heart of an icy Winter, when frost blankets the sand? With the Buell RB2 Beast Hooded Fullsuit, you can be that crazy fool! Instead of quivering hands nursing a canteen of coffee and watching from the sidelines, if you're wearing the RB2 Beast Hooded Fullsuit, you’ll be ready to rip well before anyone in the carpark peanut gallery. The RB2 Beast boasts a watertight neck seal, thanks to our easy to use slant-zip entry system, keeping you dry and toasty when the water temps dip.

ⓘ Logo size, color, and placement may vary from the images shown in the product photos.

Model Year: 2020
Manufacturers Part Number: WRB20243W0010
PRODUCT FEATURES
Ninja Neoprene
Glued and blind stitched seams with power-lite “Sizzle” seam seal on the outside
Slant Zip entry gives you one-sided water seal performance that pushes the limits of a wetsuit’s warmth potential.
Key Pocket: easy to access and secure
Embossed Supratex Tuff knee pads.
Internal thermal Insulation barrier (CHEST AND BACK)

name: Women's Seven Seas 4/3 Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
Sisstrevolution's Women’s Seven Seas 4/3 Chest Zip Wetsuit offers the perfect combination of superior performance and exceptional comfort. Crafted from lightweight, warm 100% Super stretch Japanese limestone based neoprene with a Thermal Fever Fiber lining to help insulate heat, this tailored fit suit allows for unrestricted movement while benefiting from softer eco-friendly materials laminated using AquaA solvent-free water-based lamination approved by Bluesign mills – ideal for those seeking out an ecologically responsible wetsuit option.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 4/3mm
Neoprene: 100% Super stretch Japanese limestone based
Lining: Fever Fiber
Seams: Sealed / Taped
Entry System / Zipper: Chest Zip
Hood: No Hood
Knee Pads: Yes
Key Pocket: Key Loop
Model Year: 2021/2022
Manufacturer's Part Number: GN7S43CZ
PRODUCT FEATURES
Chest-zip entry, minimal bulk with contoured water tight design
100% Super stretch Japanese limestone based neoprene - lighter, warmer, softer, stretchier, easier to put on and take off, and allows for more freedom of movement
Tripled glued, blind stitched seams
Sisstr super stretch Neo 3.0 tape allows for maximum seam sealing while having unrestricted stretch and comfort
Knee pad, Upcycled Supratex abrasion resistant for flexibility and strength
Liquid tape cuff seals to prevent flushing at cuffs
Glideskin on the neck seals to skin to prevent flushing
MANUFACTURER’S DESCRIPTION

Sisstrevolution's Seven Seas has everything you need in a chest zip wetsuit and nothing you don’t. Made with 100% Super stretch Japanese limestone based neoprene — lighter, warmer, softer, stretchier, easier to put on and take off, and allows for more freedom of movement. Featuring the Sisstre Thermal Fever Fiber lining that offers more stretch, insulates heat, and dries incredibly fast. Softer, eco-friendly, anti-fade stretch jersey laminated with AquaA eco-friendly water-based lamination is completely solvent free. Made by Bluesign approved mills. The suit is a tailored fit — anatomically correct engineered body lines allow for unrestricted performance and warmth.
